title: Japan Selloff Reflects Global Bond Deluge, Fitch’s Coulton Says
description: Japan’s bond selloff last week and its global ripples reflect wariness at a huge supply of government debt exacerbated by central bank balance-sheet reduction, according to the chief economist of Fitch Ratings.
content: Japan’s bond selloff last week and its global ripples reflect wariness at a huge supply of government debt exacerbated by central bank balance-sheet reduction, according to the chief economist of Fitch Ratings.
